name: Love Quest
overview: Love Quest is an unconventional role-playing game where 'battles' consist of attempting to impress women. The protagonist is a player-named young man whose bride Yuka suddenly disappears during their wedding. The game involves finding out what happened to her. The game was originally made for the Famicom, however it was canceled, and ported to the Super Famicom. The Famicom prototype was eventually leaked and sold in an online auction for 250000 Yen in 2008.
